verses.roman:
tam praviṣṭaṁ striyo vīkṣya
nara-varyaṁ vimohitāḥ
manasā vavrire 'bhīṣṭaṁ
patiṁ daivopasāditam

synonyms: tam—Him; praviṣṭam—entered; striyaḥ—the women; vīkṣya—seeing; nara—of men; varyam—the most excellent; vimohitāḥ—enchanted; manasā—in their minds; vavrire—chose; abhīṣṭam—desirable; patim—as their husband; daiva—by fate; upasāditam—brought.
translation: The women became enchanted when they saw that most excellent of males enter. In their minds they each accepted Him, who had been brought there by destiny, as their chosen husband.
